facts.1: Corn on the cob is a popular summer food in the United States.
facts.2: It is often served with butter and salt.
facts.3: Corn is a staple food in many cultures around the world.

facts.1: German chocolate cake is known for its rich chocolate flavor and coconut-pecan frosting.
facts.2: The cake is named after Samuel German, who developed a type of dark baking chocolate.
facts.3: It is a popular dessert in the United States, especially in the southern states.

facts.1: King Kamehameha Day is a public holiday in Hawaii, celebrated on June 11th.
facts.2: The holiday honors King Kamehameha the Great, who united the Hawaiian Islands.
facts.3: Festivities include parades, hula performances, and lei draping ceremonies.
